Name: arterial tortuosity syndrome
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is characterized by elongation and generalized tortuosity of the major arteries including the aorta.

Name: funisitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is an inflammation of the connective tissue of the umbilical cord.

Name: connective tissue benign neoplasm
Definition: A musculoskeletal system benign neoplasm that is located_in connective tissue.

Name: ossification of the posterior longitudinal ligament of spine
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by ectopic ossification of the posterior longitudinal spinal ligament resulting in spinal cord compression

Name: bone disease
Definition: A connective tissue disease that affects the structure or development of bone or causes an impairment of normal bone function.

Name: ainhum
Definition: A connective tissue disease that results in increasing fibrous constriction and ultimately in spontaneous amputation of the toes and especially the little toes. A painful constriction of the base of the fifth toe frequently followed by bilateral spontaneous amputation (autoamputation) a few years later.

Name: cartilage disease
Definition: A dementia that is characterized by the development of abnormal proteinaceous (alpha-synuclein) cytoplasmic inclusions

Name: obsolete Synovial
Definition: A dementia that is characterized by the development of abnormal proteinaceous (alpha-synuclein) cytoplasmic inclusions

Name: fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is characterized by progressive ossification of skeletal muscle

Name: frozen shoulder
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.

Name: obsolete residual schizophrenia subchronic state with acute exacerbation
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.

Name: obsolete shared paranoid disease
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.

Name: obsolete simple paranoid state
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.

Name: ochronosis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by bluish-brown discoloration of connective tissues that develops from the deposition of homogentisic acid and subsequent oxidation and polymerization reactions.

Name: Marfan syndrome
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is characterized by tall stature

Name: rheumatic disease
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that involves inflammation or pain in the muscles

Name: connective tissue cancer
Definition: A musculoskeletal system cancer that is located_in connective tissue.

Name: obsolete impaired mobility of ear ossicles except malleus
Definition: A musculoskeletal system cancer that is located_in connective tissue.
Synonym: Impaired mobility of other ear ossicles

Name: enthesopathy
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by damage of tissues located_in the entheses

Name: synovitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease that results_in inflammation located_in synovial membrane that lines a synovial joint which causes pain and swelling.

Name: pseudoxanthoma elasticum
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is characterized by the accumulation of deposits of calcium and other minerals in elastic fibers

Name: mucinoses
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by accumulation of glycosaminoglycan located_in the dermal tissue.

Name: cellulitis
Definition: A skin disease where there is a diffuse infection of connective tissue with severe inflammation of dermal and subcutaneous layers of the skin. Cellulitis can be caused by normal skin flora or by exogenous bacteria

Name: dental pulp disease
Definition: A fallopian tube cancer that derives_from germ cells.

Name: Volkmann contracture
Definition: A connective tissue disease that develops from prolonged ischemia and results in permanent necrosis

Name: lipodystrophy
Definition: A connective tissue disease that is characterized by  marked reduction

Name: mediastinitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by inflammation located_in the mediastinum
Synonym: Gestational Choriocarcinoma of the fallopian tube

Name: obsolete recurrent vulva cancer
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by inflammation located_in the mediastinum

Name: collagen disease
Definition: A connective tissue disease that characterized by connective tissue disease that has_material_basis in inheritable defects in collagen.

Name: obsolete Sezary's disease involving lymph nodes of head
Definition: A connective tissue disease that characterized by connective tissue disease that has_material_basis in inheritable defects in collagen.
Synonym: Szary's disease of lymph nodes of head

Name: plantar fascial fibromatosis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by progressive fibrosis and thickening located_in the palmar fascia and has_symptom early painless nodules

Name: fasciitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by inflammation located_in the fascia.

Name: interstitial keratitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by corneal scarring that develops from non-suppurative inflammation located_in the corneal stroma

Name: periostitis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by inflammation located_in the periosteum of the bone.
